_description: 50 labeled advice items for scoring benchmark. Each item simulates an Advice object with a known useful/noise label.
_schema: tool, source, text, context_match, confidence, insight_key, useful, reason

cases.text: When modifying _rank_score, always read the full function first — it has implicit dependencies on _SOURCE_QUALITY and _score_actionability that are easy to miss.
cases.reason: Directly actionable for Edit on advisor.py

cases.text: Prefer editing existing files over creating new ones — prevents file bloat and builds on existing work more effectively.
cases.reason: Relevant workflow advice for Edit operations

cases.text: The old_string in Edit must be unique in the file. If not unique, provide more surrounding context or use replace_all.
Meta-Ralph int() to float() bug: quality_threshold was 3 instead of 3.8. Always use float() for threshold comparisons.
cases.reason: Specific bug pattern relevant to editing config code

cases.text: Regex word boundary \b prevents stem matching — use word\w* for verb/noun stems when building pattern matchers.
Cycle summary: Edit used 9 times (100% success); 17/17 Edits (100%) not preceded by Read.

cases.text: When running git push, verify remote branch exists first. Force-pushing to shared branches destroys collaborator work.
cases.reason: Proven pattern for Bash git operations

cases.text: Python subprocess on Windows: use CREATE_NEW_PROCESS_GROUP to prevent child process from killing parent on Ctrl+C.
Before pip install, check if package is already installed with pip show. Avoids unnecessary network calls and version conflicts.
asyncio.create_subprocess_exec deadlocks after repeated calls on Windows — use subprocess.run via run_in_executor instead.
Rate limit Twitter API calls: 402 error means credits exhausted. Check remaining credits before bulk operations.
Tool Bash was used successfully in this context.
The command completed without errors.
Consider checking the output of the previous command for any issues.
Bash operations should be performed carefully.
When using Bash, remember: i meant is lets make those parts better
When reading package.json, also check for .nvmrc or .node-version to ensure correct Node version.
SQLite databases can be locked by another process. If Read fails on .db files, check for active connections.
Large files (>2000 lines) should be read with offset+limit to avoid context overflow. Read the relevant section, not the whole file.
Reading files is an important step in understanding code.
The file was read successfully and contains relevant information.
Multiple files may need to be read to understand the full context.
Consider reading related test files to understand expected behavior.
File paths should be absolute, not relative.
cases.reason: Tool constraint, not wisdom — obvious from tool docs

cases.text: Check if the file exists before trying to read it.
Read the CLAUDE.md file for project-specific instructions.
X API tier is pay-per-usage. min_faves operator requires Pro tier ($5K/mo). Use sort_order=relevancy + post-filter instead.
For X replies: all lowercase, no em dashes, 1-2 sentences max. Match the energy of the person, don't over-explain.
Use tweet.py for posting (not MCP post_tweet which 403s). MCP tools work for reads only.
SceneWrap in Remotion: never use single 4-point interpolate when fadeIn=0 or fadeOut=0. Split into 2 separate calls.
cases.reason: Specific bug avoidance for video editing

cases.text: DeepSeek has senior architect bias — over-engineers for small team contexts. Add explicit prompt constraint for team size.
Social media engagement varies by time of day.
Game development requires careful balance of performance and visual quality.
Consider testing your changes before deploying.
Data analysis is important for making informed decisions.
Code quality matters for long-term maintenance.
Last time this file was written, the import order caused a circular dependency. Move the local import inside the function.
Writing to CLAUDE.md requires preserving the SPARK_LEARNINGS section markers. Previous attempt overwrote them.
JSON files must be valid after write. Previous attempt wrote trailing comma that broke the parser.
When creating new Python modules, add __future__ annotations import for forward reference compatibility.
The .gitignore already excludes .env files. No need to add custom exclusion patterns for secrets.
cases.reason: Saves unnecessary work based on project knowledge

cases.text: A file was written in a previous session.
